name: Project Cabin (Unfinished)
description:
A prototype game Chris and I whipped up in 3 days for the Indie Tales Game Jam. Chris did the awesome art, writing, and music. I did the 3d modeling and programming. I really had fun working with someone else for the first time. The time limit made use really work hard to complete something. I hope to spend a couple more weeks to really bring this game to life and polish a lot more. Right now you can technically beat the game but it is missing quite a lot of cutscenes.

You can only get the false ending after 2 minutes pass. True ending is not in the game yet. Time is linear, stop overscoping your games for game jams.
